Detailed Description

Command system.

This provides command functionality for a terminal interface A list of commands is defined by the user at compile time, which is passed to the initialization routine at run time.

"Command line" strings are passed to the CMD_FindAndRun() routine which then parses the command, searches for a match, and runs the callback routine.

Author:
Stefan Filipek
Date:
March 2009

)

Scan through the command list and run the callback, if any.

CMD_Init should have been called first, but the length would be zero if it hasn't... so I guess it's ok.

Parameters:
cmd a pointer to the command string
args a pointer to the argument string to pass to the command callback

Parse a line and run the found command.

Will destroy the character string passed to it.
